scenario_text.value:
I apologize for involving all of you in
something so dangerous.

But I’m afraid without you, I’ve little hope
of finding Saki or Shuuji.

Don’t worry, Professor. We’ve got Agumon and
the others to look out for us.
Now let’s hurry up and find those two.

We need to find Saki and Shuuji as soon as
possible.
